mapper.select: SELECT l.lab_id, l.board_id, l.lab_name, l.lab_name_desc, l.desc_detail, l.create_date, l.modify_date, (SELECT file_path FROM img_list il WHERE il.post_number = l.lab_id and rownum=1 AND img_priority = 1) AS poster FROM lab l LEFT OUTER JOIN img_list i ON l.lab_id = i.post_number order by l.lab_id desc

SELECT distinct l.*, (SELECT file_path FROM img_list WHERE post_number = l.lab_id and rownum=1 AND img_priority = 1) AS poster, LISTAGG( CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN i.file_path END, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY i.img_priority) OVER (PARTITION BY i.post_number) AS files FROM lab l inner JOIN img_list i ON l.lab_id = i.post_number where l.lab_id = #{lab_id} order by l.lab_id desc
